name: Handshaking National Flags
description: Small hand-held national flags on sticks for waving during matches. Features vibrant team colors and country emblems. Perfect for showing national pride and team support. Lightweight and easy to hold.

name: National Flag Bunting
description: Decorative flag bunting featuring participating nation flags. Perfect for decorating viewing areas, parties, or shops. Weather-resistant material, vibrant colors. Great for creating World Cup atmosphere.

name: Regular Face Tattoo Stickers
description: Colorful face tattoo stickers for fans to show team support. Easy to apply and remove, long-lasting adhesive. Features team colors, logos, or patterns. Safe and non-toxic, suitable for all ages.

name: Glow-in-the-Dark Face Stickers
description: Fun glow-in-the-dark face stickers for night matches. Easy to apply and remove. Creates eye-catching face paint effects that glow in stadium lighting. Safe for skin, non-toxic materials.

name: Stadium Cheering Horn
description: Vibrant plastic cheering horn for stadium atmosphere. Loud and energetic sound perfect for match day celebrations. Lightweight and easy to use, creates an exciting fan experience.

name: Foam Hand / Foam Finger
description: Classic foam hand accessory for cheering on your team. Comfortable to wear, lightweight foam construction. Features team colors and numbers. Essential fan gear for stadium support.

name: Hand Clapper
description: Lightweight plastic hand clapper for creating noise and excitement. Easy to use, creates loud clapping sound. Perfect for cheering on your team during matches. Comfortable grip design.

name: Cheering Sticks
description: Colorful plastic cheering sticks for fans to wave during matches. Durable construction, vibrant colors that represent team spirit. Perfect for creating visual excitement in the stands.

name: Glow-in-the-Dark Cheering Sticks
description: Special edition cheering sticks with glow-in-the-dark feature. Perfect for night matches and evening games. Creates stunning visual effects in dark stadium environments. Batteries included.

name: National Supporter Kit
description: Complete supporter kit custom colors by country. Includes scarf, glasses, wristband, whistle, and T-shirt customized in national colors. Perfect all-in-one package for the ultimate fan experience.
